wikipedia_page.main: Malcolm Harold Chisholm  (15 October 1945 – 20 November 2015) was a Mumbai-born Scottish inorganic chemist, a Professor of Chemistry and Biochemistry, and Distinguished University Professor of Mathematical and Physical Sciences at Ohio State University who contributed to the synthesis and structural chemistry of transition metal complexes.
